external.description:
Alt: PowerShell is probably the most overpowered and underrated language on Earth.

- It has been able to do NLP since v1
- It has an object pipeline, which no other language has.
- It has rich help
- It has useful parameter metadata
- It can run any program
- It can talk to any REST api
- It can integrate any language
- It can read any format
- It can write any format
- It can orchestrate anything
- It can run in background jobs
- It can build rich ecosystems with metadata
- It can autocode commands
- It can write any language
- It can read any language
- It can use regular expressions inline
- It can inspect its own grammar
- It can have commands named anything, including symbols
- It can control AI
- It can be the ultimate AI agent
- It can post to BlueSky
- It can read every post ever sent
- It can stream data from websockets
- It can stream data from GPIO
- It can stream data of any format, any way you want it
- It is cross platform
- It is everywhere
- It is the fastest web server
- It is the fastest static site generator
- It can do things more easily than most languages
- It can do anything

PowerShell is a non-stop party.  Welcome to it!
external.title: a man in a bathtub with the words welcome to the party pal on the bottom

record.text:
